newsitem.title: TUNISIA: Tunis bourse closes slightly up.
newsitem.headline: Tunis bourse closes slightly up.

text.p: The Tunis Stock Exchange on Friday closed slightly up on higher volume, dealers said.
The market's 29-share index closed at 613.49 from 612.63 on Thursday. Volume was 1.233 million dinars against 292,410 dinars the day before.
Investment fund SPDIT rose 5.81 percent to 44.22 dinars and Arab Tunisian Bank 2.5 percent to 54 dinars.
BDET bank was down 2.98 percent to 19.84 dinars and detergents firm SPCD fell 2.59 percent to 53 dinars.
